leaves.text: The dividend-discount model has two fundamental limitations that we will now address: its reliance on dividend forecasts and lack of applicability to non-dividend-paying stocks.

stage.text: 7.5 Limitations of the Dividend-Discount Model The dividend-discount model has two fundamental limitations that we will now address: its reliance on dividend forecasts and lack of applicability to non-dividend-paying stocks. Inline Large Math Expression: The dividend-discount model has two fundamental limitations that we will now address:   ﻿its reliance on dividend forecasts and lack of applicability to non-dividend-paying stocks.
